Articles.Content:
Anybody know a way how to do docking node oneshot?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-05T07:40:00Z" title="08/05/2015 07:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 5, 2015</time> by DennyTX**
Without custom plugin - no way, I guess. What do you need it for?

> 
> Without custom plugin - no way, I guess. What do you need it for?

I do a replica on [N1-L3 soviet lunar complex](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79797-N-1-Soviet-Heavy-Booster-%28aka-11A52%29-%28OLDD-in-USSR%29-v-0-235-%2813-05-14%29?p=1205437&viewfull=1#post1205437) for a long time. Race to realism, etc. And as i know its docking device was only oneshot.
